A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The good thing about The Last Jedi\, is that it’s not a cookie cutter formula like Force Awakens. The bad thing about it was that they tried to be so away from the formula they went to far. They tried to get you to assume what would happen and then they flipped everything on its head. And that made for a film that did not live up to the creed or storyline of other previos Star Wars films. Everything you thought you knew about Star Wars goes out the window.
